page.title: 04The Day Centre
page.content: The day centre is a place where old people have a chance to enjoy them selves.They sometimes go to a lady who lives down the road.She has a big summer house which they all sit in and have their tea cooked by the lady.They sit in the sun and admire the sun and the ladys beautiful flowers.The day centre is over 100 years old,It used to be a school . On Wednesdays they have twenty eight staying for dinner,their dinners are transported from Fairmile Hospital.The day centre has been running for twelve years,it has five rooms. One for dining,one for playing games and hobbies another as a kitchen.One sitting room and one room here they hold lip reading classes.
